title: US cartoon attack suspect 'named'
description: US officials reportedly identify one of the gunmen said to have attacked a Texas event on cartoons of the Prophet Muhammad.

title: Fiorina and Carson join 2016 race
description: Carly Fiorina, the former Hewlett-Packard boss, and neurosurgeon Ben Carson join the growing Republican field for the White House.

title: Tiger Woods and Lindsey Vonn split
description: Former world number one golfer Tiger Woods and his skiing champion girlfriend Lindsey Vonn have split up, they have announced.

title: Baltimore lifts post-riot curfew
description: National Guard troops begin leaving Baltimore and a curfew is lifted, as tension subsides following rioting over the custody death of a black man.

title: New York policeman shot in the head
description: A plainclothes policeman is seriously injured by a shot to the head while attempting to question a man in New York's Queens borough.

title: New Jersey aide admits conspiracy
description: An ex-aide to New Jersey Governor Chris Christie pleads guilty to conspiracy over traffic chaos on the George Washington Bridge in 2013.

title: American Pharoah wins Kentucky Derby
description: The favourite American Pharoah lands victory in the Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs for jockey Victor Espinoza.

title: 'Success kid' raises cash for dad
description: Sam Griner, whose image spawned the 'success kid' meme, is using his fame to raise cash to pay for medical treatment for his father.

title: Tribeca festival begins in New York
description: New York's Tribeca Film Festival kicked off on Wednesday with the world premiere of Saturday Night Live documentary, Live from New York!.

title: Mayweather beats Pacquiao on points
description: Floyd Mayweather beats Manny Pacquiao on points to maintain his unbeaten record and win the richest fight in boxing history.

title: VIDEO: 'Some were opposed to US cartoon event'
description: Eyewitness Stephanie Conway tells the BBC some people were opposed to a conference on cartoons of the Prophet Muhammad in a suburb of Dallas, but she saw nothing threatening.

title: VIDEO: Heavyweight: Manila baker's boxer cake
description: A baker in Manila has made a life-size edible replica of Philippine boxer Manny Pacquiao, as he prepares to fight rival Floyd Mayweather in Las Vegas.

title: VIDEO: Meet the Vegas big fight's 'ring girls'
description: The BBC's Alex South meets the ''ring girls'' who provide an element of glamour in the big fight between Floyd Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao in Las Vegas.

title: VIDEO: Asia battle for US bullet train deal
description: Two titans of Asian business and technology battle for the contract to build America's first bullet train.

title: VIDEO: Baltimore: 'Charges will be filed'
description: Baltimore's top prosecutor, Marilyn Mosby, says she plans to file criminal charges against six police officers over the death of Freddie Gray.

title: VIDEO: Lava overflow from Hawaii volcano
description: There have been stunning scenes at Hawaii's Kilauea volcano which has been overflowing lava.

title: VIDEO: Baltimore riot mother: 'It's unacceptable'
description: A mother filmed berating her son for his involvement in the Baltimore riots has spoken about the incident to US TV programme CBS This Morning.

title: Campaignspotting 2015: Three days left
description: The US presidential campaign may just be getting started, but the 2015 UK General Election is approaching its possibly chaotic finale.

title: McDonald's announces shake-up plans
description: Fast-food chain McDonald's announces plans to restructure its business and increase its number of franchised restaurants globally.

title: Tesla unveils battery to power homes
description: US electric carmaker Tesla Motors unveils batteries that can power homes and businesses in a bid to expand beyond its vehicle business.

title: Canada country profile
description: Provides an overview of Canada, including key events and facts about the world's second-largest country

title: Puerto Rico profile
description: Provides and overview as well as facts and figures for this small dependency of the United States situated in the Caribbean

title: St Pierre and Miquelon profile
description: Provides an overview of what remains of France's once-extensive possessions in North America

title: United States country profile
description: Provides an overview of the United States, including key events and facts about this superpower

title: Is the US love affair with McDonald's waning?
description: Why some in the US are losing their love of McDonald's

title: How manicures saved Vietnam refugees
description: Why are all the manicurists in Los Angeles Vietnamese?

title: VIDEO: Modern art gets modern makeover
description: A new home for some of America's best art

title: Saving culture from war and weather
description: The teams saving history from war and weather

title: What's it like living under a curfew?
description: What's it like living under a curfew in a big city?

title: The death that changed Nascar
description: The fatal crash that changed motor racing
